long_description: From the gym to outdoor Crossfit training, the Inov8 F-Lite 185 multisport shoes outfit you for your training efforts. Highly breathable polyester mesh uppers feature thermoplastic urethane overlays for support. Polyester mesh linings wick moisture away from feet and dry quickly for comfort. Injected EVA midsoles cushion each step, and offer lightweight support. 3mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a more natural forefoot strike. Reinforced medial and lateral sections offer increased protection. Dynamic polymer shanks offer lightweight support and structure. Rubber outsoles on the F-Lite 185 shoes from Inov8 offer a sure grip on indoor and outdoor surfaces. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan friendly.
short_description: From the gym to outdoor Crossfit training, the Inov8 F-Lite 185 multisport shoes outfit you for your training efforts.
